title: What Mary Jo wanted
brief_description: Mary Jo wants a puppy more than anything. She gets her wish and the chance to show that she is prepared to care for it properly, even though it isn’t always easy. Presents a realistic depiction for children of the responsibilities involved in pet care and ownership. Based on the book by Janice May Udry.
